INDUSTRIES COMMON FEATURES GUIDE
Get Started with Business Rules Engine

Business Rules Engine lets you build powerful, scalable lookups and calculations to automate complex decisions. Rules created with Business Rule Engine are easy to maintain, and integrate directly with Flow, OmniStudio, and third-party workflow tools using connect APIs.
